T02D2127:173b-1: ma ni a'a lo ka pa ri n'a ma //
T02D2127:173b-3: bsngo ba nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba //
T02D2127:173b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2127:173b-5: kye kye rdo rje 'dzin sogs bdag dgongs gsol//
T02D2127:173b-6: dpal chen khyod kyi drin tshad kyis //
T02D2127:173b-7: bdag cag nyon mongs dgra las rgyal //
T02D2127:173b-8: legs so so mgon po khyod legs so //
T02D2127:173b-9: ae ma ho rdo rje'i thugs sangs rgyas //
T02D2127:173b-10: ae ma ho ae wam rdo rje'i chos //
T02D2127:173b-11: ae ma de sgrub dge 'dun tshogs //
T02D2127:173b-12: skyabs gsum rdo rje gcig khyod 'dud//
T02D2127:173b-13: sa gsum mkha' spyod gnas gsum dang //
T02D2127:173b-14: sgo gsum rdo rje sku gsung thugs //
T02D2127:173b-15: mngon gsum zab zhi dri bral du //
T02D2127:173b-16: ston pa khyod la bdag dga'o //
T02D2127:173b-17: de phyir bdag dang 'gro kun gyis //
T02D2127:173b-19: 'od gsal bde chen rnam mi rtog //
T02D2127:173b-20: sku gsum rnam dag mthar phyin shog / skye zhing skye ba kun du yang //
T02D2127:173b-21: rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
T02D2127:173b-22: lag na rdo rje dril 'dzin cing //
T02D2127:173b-23: zag med bdud rtsi 'thung bar shog / dri med rang 'byung skyob bde dang //
T02D2127:173b-24: dga' bde 'dus ma byas sngags zab //
T02D2127:173b-25: dkyil 'khor mchog tshogs mi slu ba'i //
T02D2127:173b-26: bden pas dngos grub mchog thob shog / rdo rje theg pa'i bsngo ba nor bu'i sgron ma //
T02D2127:173b-27: slob dpon mi pham zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2127:173b-29: // rgya gar gyi pandi ta su shr'i sh'nti dad /
